items.name: Object_Animation
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Object_Animation
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Object_Animation extends gs.Object_Picture
    ###*
    * A game object used for animations.
    *
    * @module gs
    * @class Object_Animation
    * @extends gs.Object_Picture
    * @memberof gs
    * @constructor
    ###
    constructor: (record) ->
        super()
        
        @image = record?.graphic.name
            
        component = new gs.Component_FrameAnimation(record)
        @addComponent(component)
            
            
gs.Object_Animation = Object_Animation
